name: Ancient Palace
description: A magnificent palace from a forgotten era contains the remains of royal splendor, with grand halls, private chambers, and hidden passages. The architectural marvels and royal treasures attract explorers, while the ancient magic and guardians protect against desecration.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers designed for royalty. Air carries old gold, ancient magic, and centuries of dust scent. Magnificent halls rise around you with faded grandeur speaking of forgotten kings. Skin tingles with presence of ancient magical wards. Taste of power and lost splendor fills mouth. Weight of forgotten history and royal secrets presses down on you.
